name: Jazz Night at City Hall
description: An evening of smooth jazz with local artists performing classic and contemporary pieces. Perfect for a romantic date night or relaxing evening with friends.

name: Tech Expo 2025
description: Showcasing the latest in technology and innovation. Meet startups, see demos, and network with industry professionals. Free admission for students.

name: Art in the Park Festival
description: Outdoor art exhibition featuring local painters, sculptors, and photographers. Live painting demonstrations and art workshops for all ages.

name: City Marathon 2025
description: Annual marathon event open to all ages and skill levels. Choose from 5K, 10K, or full marathon. Proceeds benefit local charities.

name: Rock Concert Under the Stars
description: An electrifying rock concert featuring top local bands. Bring your own blanket and enjoy music under the open sky.

name: Basketball Tournament
description: 3-on-3 basketball tournament for all skill levels. Prizes for winners and food trucks on site. Registration required.

name: Digital Art Workshop
description: Learn digital art techniques using tablets and software. Suitable for beginners and intermediate artists. Equipment provided.

name: Coding Bootcamp Demo Day
description: Graduating students showcase their final projects. Great opportunity to see emerging talent and network with tech companies.
